item.title: 37c3: New Important Instructions (Video)
item.description: Five years ago I gave a Lightning Talk at the 35th Chaos Communication Congress called “Pass the Cookie and Pivot to the Clouds”. Interestingly enough, that talk was about my very first post which was the advent of the Embrace The Red blog in December 2018. Fast forward… it was great to attend 37c3 in person in Hamburg this year. The Congress was packed with great talks, amazing people and awesome events and side quests.
